title: I'm Really Surprised Riot Hasn't Done This Yet
body:
Purchasable announcer packs.

I'd totally buy.

replies.body:
I would like to have an Samuel L. Jackson announcer
"This Motherf*cker has been slain"

Or a Gordon Ramsay announcer.

"ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!

I HAVE HAD IT WITH THESE MOTHERFUCKING ~~SNAKES~~ _NOOBS_ ON THIS MOTHERFUCKING ~~PLANE~~ _TEAM_!
Thats the spirit

Dude.

Tahm Kench.

> [{quoted}](name=CobaltTheMadMage,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GXwIdfiE,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-05-05T16:22:29.561+0000)
>
> Dude.
> 
> Tahm Kench.

that would actually be sooooo smooth...
Your my friend.

Sure, but we want good ones... not just champ ones.

If league can get a Rick and Morty announcer pack like Dota did, I will lose my freaking mind.

I mean like the dark star thresh one, or the gp one.

I like both of those, they provide something new.

Plus i think those are mods.

Those already exist, so I don't see the harm in putting them up for sale in the store...
 
But if they're going to make new ones, damn it I want Rick and Morty.  I started playing Dota for NO OTHER REASON than that voice pack.  It's amazing.
I have to use the Bastion Announcer Pack. That voice is magical to me.

Here comes da money, money money.

Money money money money money money money.
The greatest announcer pack would obviously be {{champion:202}}.  Though let's be real, {{champion:432}} as an announcer would be pretty chill.

id imajhin that the jhin announcer pack would get super excited when you get a quadrakill but then loses the excitement in his voice if you get a penta 

"doublekill!" "triplekill!" "QUAAAAAAAAADRAKILLLLLLL"....."pentakill."

Not just losing excitement.... losing his shit.
"Doublekill!" "Triplekill!" "QUAAAAAADRAAKILLLLLLLLLLL!!!!! THIS IS PERFECTION!"
Pentakill: "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO"
lol I'd imagine there are some champions they wouldnt be able to do the voices of

pfft yeah, reserve good ideas for OTHER games, I don't want more _optional_ content in my game!

joke








you
huh
omfg, i would LOVE a kindred announcer!
rammus announcer

"OK"
"DOUBLE-OK!"
"TRIPLE-OK!"
"QUADRA-OK!"
"PENTA-OK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

you can cahnge or make your own. i have a fluithy frank one
I've bought voice packs in SMITE. Would buy Ahri announcer pack. Would pay extra if it was in Japanese. Should enable us which language we want it at least.
yeet
I have the announcer muted the last thing i need is for the game to verbally notify to me that my team is feeding.
